title: Strengthening Business Strategy Practical Skills: Design and Application of Language MOOC Quality Evaluation

context.prior_knowledge: Online learning experience and foundational language education knowledge
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Explain the four core elements of the LMOOC Quality Evaluation Scale (LQES): instructional design, language instructor competency, educational implementation, and technical support
Develop and validate assessment tools using mixed research methods (literature analysis, expert validation, exploratory/confirmatory factor analysis)
Systematically evaluate the quality of actual language MOOCs by applying the 26-item LQES
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
